review: Doctor was exceptional in understanding my concerns, actively listening, and offering valuable advice. Their compassionate and humble nature made the experience truly positive. I wholeheartedly recommend  doctor to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was detect with stone in my gall bladder. Dr. Gagan Jain and all the staff treated me very nicely. Feeling like a home. Special thanks to Zoya di. Wo beginning from 1sep till my last 14 sep to mere sath thi. 

Once again thnku meri care krne k liye.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I went there with my mother for her diabetes treatment, I really like Dr. Gagan how he explained and made her comfortable. Explained really well I couldn‚Äôt find Btr doctor for her. We have Jst started her treatment, results are still awaited I m hoping for the best as I trust him.
I went there for fever and throat infection. Doctor listened to my situation and provided explanation & remedies in detail. Good experience overall.

I had typhoid a month ago and i booked an appointment and the doctor wrote tests and some medicines and asked me to call him after i get the reports i kept calling him for 2 days , the second day when he picked the phone he said you don‚Äôt have typhoid and didn‚Äôt bother to mention anything else and disconnected the same day at night i got a temperature of 103.7 and i tried calling the hospital then the on duty doctor told me that i have mild typhoid and my esr level is extremely high because of which my temperature is rising again and again then eventually my typhoid got better and my joints started paining a month after that and i thought maybe its some sort of post effect so i went to Doctor Gagan again and he wrote tests for Arthritis the reports came and i called the pathology and they told me there reports are negative and the doctor asked me to come with the reports next day while he wasn‚Äôt available for the next 4 days i tried calling him and again he didn‚Äôt answer today i went to the doctor and the receptionist charged me again even though it was not my fault that the doctor was unavailable right after i got my reports but anyways then he told me i have mild arthritis and it‚Äôs genetic i was confused because no one in my entire family ever had it so I consulted a family doctor who lives in my home town *** ** *** *** ******* *** **** ** ******* *** ******** *** *** ********** ********* *** *** **** ** **** *** ** * ***** **** ******** ******** ** * ******** *** * ** ******* ***** *** ** **** I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this hospital to anyone.
reply_text: Doctors can also take leave , a doctor is always present in the hospital to guide the patients. Doctors can be busy in emergency situations, so it's normal for not picking up every phone all the time.

tags: Wait time,
review: appoint time was 9.30. I was in clinic. At 9.45 receptionist told that doctor will come after 30-45 min atleast so left the place as I had some commitments. Doctors can also be busy or late sometimes but the reception people should inform  the appointments earlier. That's my opinion. Can't comment on doctor
Doctor is good and suggested me the best. Less medicine advised and i will visit again after 20 days and will update more.
Very good in nature üëè staff was so cool doc was very polite knowledge  was too good I will definitely recommend this doc to my friend and my relatives.
